description: The file defines a React functional component 'App' which manages theme state, includes several layout components (Header, Sidebar, MainContainer), routing (AppRoutes), and styles the main divs. It serves as the top-level component for a React application front-end, orchestrating layout and theme toggling.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Functional React component that manages theme state, applies theme to document, and renders layout components.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
